channel.title: Team_Rocket - Devolution Version: 1.00
channel.description:
EDIT: Please note, this was not done by Jack Bower or Impulser. This was done by Bruno.
A member of our team has just completed "cleaning" a Devolution 7.0 source. We thought we'd release it for you guys. We know this is an old and outdated source, but hopefully someone finds it useful. (y)
Development Log: [url=http://pastebin.com/u2pvaQFG]11/12/2011 Removed A bunch of things related to Combat , PvP and NPC Combat f - Pastebin.com[/url]
[IMG]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/7833/semttulolld.png[/img]
This release also includes a Client compatible with the Source.
Release: [url=http://uppit.com/rvzq2f5alpwx/SRC.rar]Download SRC.rar @ UppIT[/url]
Credits:
98% - Bakatool and the creators/developers of Devolution. 2% - Team_Rocket Development Team

item.title: Team_Rocket - Devolution Version: 1.00
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Praise, post:2, topic:426351”][quote author=The Outsider link=topic=528924.msg3859641#msg3859641 date=1324593000]
Mr. Hankey is not a Delta.
[/quote]Well, people say Delta is shit, and as you can see, Mr Hankey is a giant fucking turd, therefor, they are calling Delta’s… Mr Hankey.[/quote]
Mr. Hankey also talks, does a Delta? Insult to Mr. Hankey if you ask me… don’t forget to bring a towel or I’ll kick you in the nuts. God dammit.

Read full topic

item.title: Team_Rocket - Devolution Version: 1.00
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:14, topic:426234”][quote author=The Outsider link=topic=528924.msg3859641#msg3859641 date=1324593000]
Mr. Hankey is not a Delta.
[/quote]
Lol.

Nice release. Although I still think you should spend your time improving other, better sources instead or removing bad content on worse sources. Completely up to you though.[/quote]

[Quote]
EDIT: Please note, this was not done by Jack Bower or Impulser. This was done by Bruno.
A member of our team has just completed “cleaning” a Devolution 7.0 source. We thought we’d release it for you guys. We know this is an old and outdated source, but hopefully someone finds it useful.[/Quote]

This wasn’t done to be released on MoparScape. I agree with you though, I don’t plan on doing anymore cleaning or content removal and releasing. I’ll probably be doing a tutorial on how to implement a .CFG file for NPCDialogue usage next.

Read full topic

item.title: Team_Rocket - Devolution Version: 1.00
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:10, topic:426234”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=528924.msg3859440#msg3859440 date=1324586498]

stop removing shit and just fix it/perfect it.

We’ve only done this twice, and the first time was only because we’re going be using it as a base. It was released on R-S and got alot of positive response. Then another member decided to do a Devolution in their spare time. Stop having a bad attitude about it and just embrace it.
[/quote]

I’d rather not.[/quote]

It’s totally up to you, I just thought I’d explain it.

Read full topic

item.title: Team_Rocket - Devolution Version: 1.00
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

MrReaper14:

Why combat removed? delta is good idea tho…

Player V.S. Player, and Player V.S. NPC Combat on a Devolution source was very poorly done. It was never any good, and lacks too many features that modern servers now have. Most (almost all) of the features for Devolution were poorly programmed actually.

Read full topic

item.title: Team_Rocket - Devolution Version: 1.00
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

tinyscape:

You guys do a good job at this, keep it up

Thank you, we appreciate the positive feedback. Do you have a suggestion for what we should do next? We refuse to work with PI. I’m thinking DeltaScape with Combat removed.

Read full topic
